summary: A young French girl orphaned in a Nazi air attack is befriended by the son of a poor farmer, and together they try to come to terms with the realities of death.
cast: Georges Poujouly|Brigitte Fossey|Amédée|Laurence Badie|Madeleine Barbulée|Suzanne Courtal|Lucien Hubert|Jacques Marin|Marcel Mérovée|Violette Monnier|Denise Péronne|Fernande Roy|Louis Saintève|André Wasley|André Enard|Marcelle Feuillade|Roger Fossey|Louis Herbert|Bernard Musson|Annie Ravel|Georges Sauval|Maud Slover|Janine Zorelli
title: Juegos prohibidos
